channel.title: Menus on Prashant Thakkar
channel.description: Recent content in Menus on Prashant Thakkar

item.title: Android Menus
item.description: Menus are one of the most important parts of any application and when it comes to mobile Menus become more important considering the fact that area available is restricted. Through this blog we will look at the following various type of Android Menus available with example for each of them: Options Menu Context Menu Submenu Options Menu: Menu opened when MENU key on the device is clicked is called options menu.
